content: space down the row double_crochet in the last stitch extended hexagon cardigan #fleetingobsessionsart #fleetingobsessionscrafts website https //fleetingobsessionsart squarespace com facebook fleeting obsessions | facebook tiktok @fleetingobsessionsart | tiktok instagram @fleetingobsessionsart youtube 6 fleeting obsessions art - youtube a note from the creator i wanted to thank you for purchasing my pattern the love and support i have received since i started this journey has been amazing my goal with every pattern is to make it easily readable and adjustable to your own personal preferences i hope how to fold your sleeve looking at your square that by the end of this pattern you have learned the skills necessary to make your own designs that are custom to top fold it in half and lay on its side then fold the you my goal is to inspire and help others make their own extension in half as well beautiful art this is the sleeve half i look forward to seeing your creations please tag me in any social media you want with pictures of you in your finished item i really want to see them you can even email your images at fleetingobsessions@gmail com and i will feature them on my tiktok or other social media pages i am happy to tag you if you are sure to let me know who to credit you deserve just as much credit as i do for your finished piece stay crafty krista mccloud fleeting obsessions art use code extended for 50% off the sweet hexagon cardigan pattern
